function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncontrolled SARS-CoV-2 transmission with a basic reproductive number close to 2 across regions","Impact":"Potential for widespread spread of the virus and increased cases of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implement effective isolation, testing, and public health measures","Technologies":"Testing technologies, contact tracing apps, and public health infrastructure","People":"Population of KSA and other countries, particularly those in close contact with infected individuals","Owner":"Public health authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"Considerable uncertainty in estimates of intervention effectiveness, particularly for school closures","Impact":"Inability to accurately assess the effectiveness of interventions and make informed decisions","Mitigation":"Increased data collection and analysis, robust evaluation of intervention outcomes, and collaboration with scientific community","Technologies":"Data analytics, modeling software, and collaboration platforms","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers, and policy makers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies, and scientific community"},{"Description":"Inconsistent results in studies evaluating the effectiveness of interventions such as lockdowns, test/trace/isolate programs, and travel restrictions","Impact":"Limited understanding of the actual impact of these interventions on SARS-CoV-2 transmission","Mitigation":"Standardization of study methodologies, peer review of research findings, and meta-analysis of multiple studies","Technologies":"Data management tools, meta-analysis software, and research collaboration platforms","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers, and policy makers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies, and scientific community"}]}
